cpl.readme:
[[Github|https://github.com/EvidentlyCube/TW5-FilterOperatorslete]]

----

! Features

A collection of awesome filters. The documentation for the filters is available on [[Evidently Cube Plugin Showcase|https://evidentlycube.github.io/TW5-PluginShowcase/#Extra%20Operators]].


!! focus-on – Focus on part of the text

Find specific text and its context and remove everything else.

!! susearch – Intelligent search

Intelligently search through tiddler fields optionally including or ignoring the wikitext.

!! susearch-mark – Highlight search results

Create a preview of the search results with highlighted matches. Ignore wikitext, strip wikitext or parse wikitext and decide whether to display it as text or HTML.

!! susearch-sort – Intelligent sort of search results

intelligently sort search results by how relevant they are to a search query.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/EvidentlyCube/ExtraOperators

cpl.name: Extra Operators (Search)
cpl.description: Adds new filter operators: focus-on & susearch & susearch-mark & susearch-sort
